--   Generate SubPackage
@package drasil-gen

module Language.Drasil.Generate

-- | Generate a number of artifacts based on a list of recipes.
gen :: DocSpec -> Document -> PrintingInformation -> IO ()

genCode :: Choices -> CodeSpec -> IO ()
